title: VMware security advisory (AV25-705)
description: On October 28, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products. Included were critical updates for the following :
products: VMware Tanzu GemFire Management Console  versions prior to 1.4.1
VMware Tanzu for Valkey  versions prior to 7.2.11
VMware Tanzu for Valkey  versions prior to 8.0.5
VMware Tanzu for Valkey  versions prior to 8.0.6
VMware Tanzu for Valkey  versions prior to 8.1.4
VMware Tanzu for Valkey on Kubernetes  versions prior to 3.2.0
VMware Tanzu GemFire  versions prior to 10.2.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
